sections.heading: Community College Act of 1966; Short Title
sections.text: Section 389.2 - Violation of Michigan Election Law Applicable to Petitions; Penalties.331-1966-1 - Part 1 (389.11...389.88)331-1966-2 - Part 2 (389.101...389.195)

sections.heading: Violation of Michigan Election Law Applicable to Petitions; Penalties.
sections.text:
A petition under section 83 or 152, including the circulation and signing of the petition, is subject to the Michigan election law. A person who violates a provision of the Michigan election law applicable to a petition described in this section is subject to the penalties prescribed for that violation in the Michigan election law.

History:Add. 1998, Act 153, Eff. Mar. 23, 1999 ;-- Am. 2003, Act 306, Eff. Jan. 1, 2005
